name: echocial
description: Frontend of Echocial. A mobile-first app for online reputation
author: Ahmed Derbala <ahmed.derbala@esprit.tn>

scripts.first-time: cp src/config.sample.js src/config.js && npm run i && npm run start:local
scripts.i:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm ci -f --omit=dev && npx expo install --fix
scripts.push: cp src/config/config.js src/config/config.sample.js && npm run format && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.clean: rm -f package-lock.json && rm -r -f node_modules && rm -r -f .expo && npm cache clean -f && npm run i && npm run start:default
scripts.clean:prod: rm -r -f node_modules && rm -r -f .expo && npm cache clean -f && npm run i:prod
scripts.update: rm -r -f backups/* && cp package.json backups/package.json.backup && cp package-lock.json backups/package-lock.json.backup 2>/dev/null; true && mv node_modules backups/node_modules.backup 2>/dev/null; true && npm i -D npm-check-updates -f && ncu -u && npm run clean
scripts.restore: cp backups/package.json.backup package.json && cp backups/package-lock.json.backup package-lock.json && mv backups/node_modules.backup node_modules && npm run start:default
